entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 7:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow after midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
